text: "I couldn't breathe. .. I was totally out of it. .. I called my wife .. & said, 'In case I don't make it, I love you.'" .. then came the switch in meds to chloroquine & a Z-pack, he said. "It was a miracle," he said. "It saved my life." #chloroquine #COVID19AB #covid19Canada https://t.co/XgHf8HNRJo
